# UIPrintServiceExtension

**Class**

An extension that locates and sets up a printer without a configuration profile.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class UIPrintServiceExtension
```

## Overview

Support cloud printing by creating an extension instead of requiring users to install a managed configuration profile to set up an AirPrint printer. Create an extension by subclassing `UIPrintServiceExtension`. By creating your own extension, you can expose a cloud printer destination to a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrinterPickerController]. The extension matches printer destinations that fulfill the specified print-job attributes.

Create an instance of `UIPrinterDestination` to describe a printer to the system. The extension can then search for the printer, or set of printers, using [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintServiceExtension/printerDestinations(for:)]. This method matches the requirements of a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintInfo] object and returns an array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrinterDestination].

## Locating a printer

- **printerDestinations(for:)**: Searches for a printer destination that matches the print-job attributes.

## Related Documentation

- **App extensions**: Extend your app’s basic functionality to other parts of the system.

## Printer service discovery

- **UIPrinterDestination**: A description of a single printer.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
